summary: You were seen for diabetes and high blood pressure. You need to take three medicines and see your doctor again in two weeks.

diagnoses.name: Type 2 Diabetes
diagnoses.plain_language: Your body has trouble managing blood sugar

action_items: Take Metformin 500mg twice daily with meals
Check blood sugar every morning before eating
Follow up with Dr. Williams by March 7
warnings: Go to the ER if you have chest pain, severe headache, or blood sugar over 400
